issue.title: [Plasma] Plasma documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1257](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1257). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The documentation for Plasma should contain the following section:

- Installation and Getting Started
- The Plasma Python API (a high level overview and sphinx generated documentation)
- The Plasma C++ API (a high level overview and doxygen documentation)
- Using Arrow and Pandas with Plasma

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1257?focusedCommentId=16110182) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 881
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/881>
